messages.title: Vote Faiza Shaheen
messages.content: On December 12 for a fresh start, where community comes first. Change is coming!

messages.title: My priorities if I become your MP

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Whipps Cross Hospital and social care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fully-funded, environmentally sustainable Whipps Cross for local needs. Affordable housing for NHS staff. End NHS privatisation.
Reversal of funding cuts. New provision in local primary schools, especially Woodford.
Secure funding for a new youth centre.
More local community support and police officers. Establishment of neighborhood forums for safety.
More buses from Chingford Mount to Highams Park and reinstating the Hall Farm curve.
Final Say referendum on Brexit. Remain option on ballot. Remain in the European Union.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour will hold a Final Say referendum on Brexit, with a credible Leave option alongside Remain. I will campaign to remain in the European Union.
issues.education: Every single local state school has seen cuts and, in some areas, there are simply not enough places for children. I will campaign for a reversal of funding cuts and demand new provision in local primary schools, especially in Woodford where parents are struggling to find places.
issues.health: I am committed to a fully-funded, environmentally sustainable Whipps Cross that can meet the needs of a growing local population, on a site that holds truly affordable housing for NHS staff. A Labour government will invest in local social care infrastructure and end NHS privatisation.
issues.transport: More buses from Chingford Mount to Highams Park. Reinstating Hall Farm curve, providing regular railway access from Chingford and Highams Park to Stratford International and on to Docklands.

community.content: More local community support and police officers. Establishment of multiple local neighborhood forums for safety. Regular open meetings with ward police teams.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Derrick Hibbert on behalf of Faiza Shaheen, both at 79 Chase Lane, London, E4 6JT. Printed by Keyprint Printing Limited, 7-8 17 Pembroke Street, London ECA 2A.

examples: A costed study commissioned within 12 months.
